entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
